references.citationString: Brut, A., Ceschia, E., Claverie, N., Granouillac, F., Lemaire, B., Tallec, T., Zawilski, B., ICOS RI, 2021. ICOS ETC Bio Meteo Raw ASCII, Lamasquere, 2021-03-28, https://hdl.handle.net/11676/ZkffEfDCJflWOnSayB-zFa6a

comments: The Lamasquere station, with ICOS code FR-Lam, is located at 25 km from Toulouse city (southwestern France), in a flat large alluvial valley and on the border of the “Touch” river. The site is a cropland plot characterized by a maize (Zea mays L.) / winter wheat (Triticum aestivum L.) / maize (Zea mays L.) / winter wheat (Triticum aestivum L.) rotation.
self.label: FR-Lam

documentation.name: FR-Lam ICOS Ecosystem Station Labelling Report.pdf

comments: Lands covered with temporary crops followed by harvest and a bare soil period (e.g., single and multiple cropping systems). Note that perennial woody crops will be classified as the appropriate forest or shrub land cover type.
ecosystemType.label: Croplands

self.label: ICOS ETC Bio Meteo Raw ASCII
